title: The Cumulative Case for Alternative Architecture
prompt: An overhead view of weathered wooden table scattered with hand-drawn maps, handwritten notes, and architectural sketches of rural buildings—a county clinic, farmstead, small-town main street—bathed in soft morning light from a window. Papers overlap organically; a cup of coffee sits half-finished in the corner. The composition suggests collaborative planning and problem-solving in a modest rural kitchen or community center, with warm earth tones and natural shadows creating texture and depth, photographed in documentary style with shallow depth of field.
